title: As Pixel Watch goes all-in on Fitbit, founder says Google Fit will co-exist for now
content:
The culmination of Google’s $2.1 billion acquisition of Fitbit is here, with the Pixel Watch officially coming later this year with a fully integrated Fitbit experience. What does that mean for Google Fit? We’ve been curious to know for a while, but it seems Fitbit and Google Fit only have plans to co-exist.

more…

The post As Pixel Watch goes all-in on Fitbit, founder says Google Fit will co-exist for now appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: The Google Pixel Watch is going all in on Fitbit for its health suite, but the Google Fit app won't be going away anytime soon, it seems.
